valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Sat 27 Sep 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Sun 28 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low 300 miles west of Trafalgar 998 expected FitzRoy 997 by 1800 Saturday. New lows expected Irish Sea 1010 and Faeroes 1000 by same time

FitzRoy.text:
Wind
In south, southwesterly 3 to 5, becoming cyclonic 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 later. In north, cyclonic 4 to 6, becoming northerly or northwesterly 4 or 5.
Sea state
In south, slight or moderate, becoming moderate or rough. in north, moderate or rough.
Weather
In south, thundery rain . In north, rain for a time.
Visibility
In south, moderate or poor, occasionally good. In north, good, occasionally moderate.
